document.description: Pick your condiments from about 20 or so 4. Pick your extras like sauteed onions, mushrooms, ect... ... The BEST fast food restaurant for TASTE and SERVICE!!!

Backyard Burgers 3 reviews Category: Restaurants Burgers Burgers [Edit] 2240 Madison Street Clarksville , TN 37043 (931) 221-0065 http://backyardburgers.com/ourloca… Add Photos Price Range: $ Accepts Credit Cards: Yes Attire: Casual Good for Groups: Yes Takes Reservations: No Take-out: Yes Waiter Service: No Noise Level: Average First to Review C S. From Reviewers You're Following
Reviews from Your Friends
3 reviews in English
Review from Deegan P.
3 friends 5 reviews
Deegan P.
Grande Prairie, AB Canada 4/27/2011 The burgers were awesome and cheap. There's 4 steps. 1. Pick your meat 1/3lb burger is $3.79 (there's chicken and veggie too) 2. Pick your cheese ( i think there was 12 kinds or so ) 3. Pick your condiments from about 20 or so 4. Pick your extras like sauteed onions, mushrooms, ect...
It's burgers and fry's. It's fast, cheap and good.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool

Review from Jimmy M.
Elite '12 10 friends 126 reviews
Jimmy M.
Clarksville, TN 9/5/2011 Food was okay. I would compare this place to a chilli's with a fastfood atmosphere. I would go back to this place in the future. This particular location has a 10% military discount.
Listed in: Military friendly

Review from C S.
3 friends 45 reviews
C S.
Clarksville, TN 7/5/2010 When they first opened the food was good and the burger pattys were freshly made. Now they use some flux meat patty that is pre-formed t look irregularly shaped. It is really kind of freaky. At any rate not he best burger in town and for the money the chain fast food stores have them beat.
